ui.panel.config.introduction: Hér er mögulegt að stilla af íhluti og ioBroker. Því miður er ekki hægt að breyta öllu í gegnum viðmótið ennþá, en við erum að vinna í því.
ui.panel.config.common.editor.confirm_un: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.area_registry.caption: Svæðaskrá
ui.panel.config.area_registry.descriptio: Yfirlit yfir öll svæði á heimilinu þínu.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.int: Svæði eru notuð til að skipuleggja hvar tæki eru staðsett. Þessar upplýsingar verða notaðar innan ioBroker til að hjálpa þér að skipuleggja viðmótið, réttindi og samþættingar við önnur kerfi.
Til að staðsetja tæki inn á tilteknu svæði þá skal notast við hlekkinn hér fyrir neðan til að vafra yfir á samþættingarsíðu og þar smella á stillta samþættingu til að fá upp spjaldið fyrir tækið.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.no_: Það virðist sem að þú hafir engin svæði ennþá!
ui.panel.config.area_registry.no_areas: Það virðist sem að þú hafir engin svæði ennþá!
ui.panel.config.core.caption: Almennt
ui.panel.config.core.description: Staðfesta að stillingarskráin þín sé rétt og stjórnun á miðlara
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: Að breyta stillingum getur verið þreytandi ferli og við vitum það. Þetta svæði mun reyna að létta þér lífið hvað það varðar.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Ritill er óvirkur af því að stillingar eru vistaðar í configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.core.section.server_cont: Sumir hlutar af ioBroker er hægt að hlaða inn að nýju án þess að það krefjist endurræsingar. Með því að velja að endurhlaða þá mun sú aðgerð hlaða inn nýjum stillingum.
Staðfestu stillingarnar þínar ef þú hefur gert breytingar á stillingum og vilt ganga úr skugga um að þær séu í lagi
ui.panel.config.server_control.caption: Stjórnun þjóns
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Staðfestu stillingarnar þínar ef þú hefur gert breytingar á stillingum og vilt ganga úr skugga um að þær séu í lagi
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Sumir hlutar af ioBroker er hægt að hlaða inn að nýju án þess að það krefjist endurræsingar. Með því að velja að endurhlaða þá mun sú aðgerð hlaða inn nýjum stillingum.
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.s: Ertu viss um að þú viljir endurræsa ioBroker?
Ertu viss um að þú viljir stöðva ioBroker?
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Séraðlögun
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Tweak per-entity attributes. Added/edited customizations will take effect immediately. Removed customizations will take effect when the entity is updated.
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.includ: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
ui.panel.config.customize.warning.not_ap: Changes made here are written in it, but will not be applied after a configuration reload unless the include is in place.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_cus: The following attributes are already set in customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_out: The following attributes are customized from outside of customize.yaml
ui.panel.config.customize.different_incl: Possibly via a domain, a glob or a different include.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_set: The following attributes of the entity are set programmatically.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_ove: You can override them if you like.
ui.panel.config.customize.attributes_not: The following attributes weren't set. Set them if you like.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Sjálfvirkni
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: The automation editor allows you to create and edit automations. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.pick_a: Veldu sjálfvirkni sem á að breyta
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Við fundum ekki neinar sjálfvirkni-skilgreiningar sem hægt er að breyta
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Notaðu sjálfvirkni til að glæða húsið þitt lífi
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Eingöngu er hægt að breyta sjálfvirkni í automations.yaml
Villa kom upp við að hlaða inn sjálfvirkni  ({err_no}).
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: Þú ert með óvistaðar breytingar. Ertu viss um að þú viljir fara?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Kveikjur sjá um að ræsa sjálfvirkni reglur. Það er mögulegt að tilgreina margar kveikjur fyrir sömu regluna. Þegar kveikja er ræst þá mun ioBroker sannreyna skilyrðin ef einhver og kalla á aðgerðina.
Ert þú viss um að þú viljir eyða?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Conditions are an optional part of an automation rule and can be used to prevent an action from happening when triggered. Conditions look very similar to triggers but are very different. A trigger will look at events happening in the system while a condition only looks at how the system looks right now. A trigger can observe that a switch is being turned on. A condition can only see if a switch is currently on or off.
Ertu viss um að þú viljir eyða?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: Aðgerðir er það sem ioBroker mun gera þegar sjálfvirkni er ræst.
Ertu viss um að þú viljir eyða?
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Skrifta
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Use scripts to execute a sequence of actions.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.delete_con: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
ui.panel.config.script.editor.sequence_s: The sequence of actions of this script.
ui.panel.config.scene.caption: Scenes
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.introductio: The scene editor allows you to create and edit scenes. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured ioBroker correctly.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.no_scenes: We couldn’t find any editable scenes
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.only_editab: Only scenes defined in scenes.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.scene.picker.delete_conf: Are you sure you want to delete this scene?
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.introductio: Use scenes to bring your home alive.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.load_error_: Only scenes in scenes.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.unsaved_con: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.name: Nafn
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.devices.int: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all the devices to the state you want for this scene.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Entities that do not belong to a devices can be set here.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.de: If you add an entity that belongs to a device, the device will be added.
ui.panel.config.cloud.caption: ioBroker skýið
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Stjórna heimili að heiman með Alexa og Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
ioBroker Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.password_err: Lykilorð eru að minnsta kosti 8 stafir
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: Þú verður að breyta lykilorðinu þínu áður en þú skráir þig inn.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: Þú þarft að staðfesta tölvupóstinn þinn áður en þú skráir þig inn.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with ioBroker Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of ioBroker Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of ioBroker away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of ioBroker Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for ioBroker Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your ioBroker instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: ioBroker Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the ioBroker skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the ioBroker skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to ioBroker from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.title: Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.title: Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.a: The webhook is available at the following url:

ui.panel.config.cloud.dialog_cloudhook.c: Ertu viss um að þú viljir afvirkja þennan vefkrók?

ui.panel.config.devices.confirm_rename_e: Do you also want to rename the entity id's of your entities?
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.caption: Einingarskrá
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.picker.i: ioBroker heldur bókhald utanum allar einingar sem verið greindar. Hver þessara eininga hafa einingar-auðkenni (ID) sem er frátekið bara fyrir þessa tilteknu einingu.

Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from ioBroker. Note, removing the entity registry entry won't remove the entity. To do that, follow the link below and remove it from the integrations page.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.u: Þessi eining er ekki tiltæk eins og er.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.e: Disabled entities will not be added to ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.c: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Deleting an entry will not remove the entity from ioBroker. To do this, you will need to remove the integration '{platform}' from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.n: Note: this might not work yet with all integrations.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Persónur
ui.panel.config.person.description: Stjórna persónum sem Home assistant er að rekja.
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: Note: persons configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Looks like you have not created any persons yet.
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete: Ertu viss um að þú viljir eyða þessari persónu?
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete2: Öll tæki sem tilheyra þessari persónu munu verða óúthlutuð.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Nafn
ui.panel.config.person.detail.device_tra: Veldu tæki sem tilheyrir þessari persónu.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.no_device_: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.

ui.panel.config.zha.caption: ZHA
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.head: Zigbee sjálfvirkni - Bæta við tækjum
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Uppgötvuð tæki munu birtast hér. Fylgdu leiðbeiningunum fyrir tækið þitt og setjið tækið í pörunarstillingu.
ui.panel.config.zha.network_management.i: Commands that affect the entire network
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.head: Tækjaumsýsla
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.intr: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.hint: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.help: Select a device to view per-device options.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_commands.hel: Select a command to interact with.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.updateDevic: Stilltu sérsniðið heiti fyrir þetta tæki í tækjaskránni.
ui.panel.config.zwave.caption: Z-Wave
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Run commands that affect the Z-Wave network. You won't get feedback on whether most commands succeeded, but you can check the OZW Log to try to find out.
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: Þetta gæti tekið smá stund, veltur á stærð netsins.
Awake nodes have been queried. Sleeping nodes will be queried when they wake.
